mods:titleInfo.mods:title: [Letter] 1839 Jun. 13, Moringo County, McKinley, Alabama [to] Henry King, Rural Rest, Rutherford County, Murfreesboro, Tennessee / James King

mods:mods.mods:abstract: This is a letter dated June 13, 1839 from James King to his son Henry King. James King gives his son several directions for looking after the plantation, and requests that every thing be well tended to.

mods:location.mods:physicalLocation: Middle Tennessee State University. Albert Gore Research Center

mods:recordInfo.mods:recordContentSource: Middle Tennessee State University. Albert Gore Research Center
